attributes.action: install Mr. Tony as a Secretary of State of some description
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Gordy,

Can I be a Secretary of State? Promise to be good, and I do a GREAT cuppa. My mum says I'd be good at it as I'm lovely and I care about things and stuff.

I'd like to be Minister for Making Fit Women Wear Less Clothes please, but I'd settle for the Foreign Office I guess. I know more about foreign affairs than at least two of the last four American Presidents, and I love skiing.

I look forward to my appointment party. I'd love to see the moves President Obama's taught you on the dancefloor. Do you ceilidh? We could have dwarves holding trays of cocaine on their heads like Freddie Mercury did.

Love,

Mister Tony

P.S. I resign

P.P.S. I don't really, that was a topical joke for you

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
